name: ice-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.
